caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities; creating a criminal offense.
last_action: 04/02/2025 H Scheduled for public hearing on . . .
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated countries (China, Iran, North Korea, Russia) from purchasing or acquiring real property in Texas. Chinese citizens domiciled in China are directly impacted and cannot purchase real estate. Violations result in property divestiture and criminal penalties. Chinese companies headquartered in China or controlled by Chinese government are also banned from property acquisition.
translation: 该法案禁止来自指定国家（中国、伊朗、朝鲜、俄罗斯）的个人和实体在德克萨斯州购买或获得不动产。在中国定居的中国公民直接受影响，不能购买房地产。违反规定将导致资产剥离和刑事处罚。总部设在中国或受中国政府控制的中国公司也被禁止获得房地产。
